#id=1
#text=This past weekend I went to get a hair cut .
#id=2
#text=My hair has grown out quite a bit and I hate it when it takes too long to dry .
#id=3
#text=That 's usually my indication to get a hair cut .
#id=4
#text=I went down to the barber shop near my apartment early in the morning so that I could avoid the lines .
#id=5
#text=This particular time I was the first to arrive .
#id=6
#text=The barber knows me already so I just hop into the chair and tell him the usual .
#id=7
#text=The usual for me is to just cut my hair short .
#id=8
#text=This involves using the trimmer on the back and sides , and then a scissor cut on the top .
#id=9
#text=The top I keep longer otherwise it sticks up and is uncontrollable .
#text=The process takes about 20 minutes but there 's a TV there so I can watch some of the news while he cuts my hair .
#text=After the haircut , I pay him and leave him a pretty good tip since we 've known each other for so long .
